price: Dan sesungguhnya telah Kami anugerahkan kepada Ibrāhīm hidayah kebenaran sebelum (Musa dan Hārūn) 961 dan adalah Kami mengetahui (keadaan)nya.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ رُشۡدَهُۥ مِن قَبۡلُ وَكُنَّا بِهِۦ عَٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: 961.  Maksudnya, sebelum diturunkan Taurat kepada Nabi Musa ‘Alaihissalām dan Nabi Hārūn  ‘Alaihissalām

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā ib'rāhīma rush'dahu min qablu wakunnā bihi ʿālimīna
